aircraft.value: Hawk Defender - AC-4194-152 at Zone-3 Facility

defect_observed.value: Electronic warfare system false alerts. Abnormality observed during system test.

root_cause.value: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Mission Computer component. Physical examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.

corrective_action.value: Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock

preventive_action.value: Implement quality control check at manufacturing stage

remarks_investigation.value: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 19/05/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Air Cmde S.B. Rao

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 22/05/2023 Signature: Gp Capt N.R. Kumar

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 21/05/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr M.S. Reddy

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 26/05/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 28/05/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Mission Critical
b) Defect Observed: Electronic warfare system false alerts. Abnormality observed during system test.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Mission Computer component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
